contexts.context: ...his difficulties with Chester. Reaching for my Authorised <mark>Version</mark>, for surely no one would have dared to...
...the German text. Have you ever compared the Authorized <mark>Version</mark> with Martin Luther?" "Funny you should ask that"...
...with the comment that he would "like an English <mark>version</mark> as well." I had thought my two texts were...
...done by whoever it was who wrote the prose <mark>version</mark> of the Weinheber poem? I have that text...
